channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Path has been diverted for years with locked gate because of deer. Now seems to have a structure built on it, 12th May
item.description:
Footpath, diverted between: SO 93615 18724 East 393615 North 218724 SO 94542 18535 East 393542 North 218535 Now appears to be built on at the end nearest Leckhampton Lane. Looks like existing structure has been replaced and extended recently. Long and Lat are from OS Maps app and may be out by a few metres

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crippetts Lane, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead seagull, 12th May
item.description:
There's a large dead seagull on the easterly corner where Brook Road meets Tewkesbury Road, on the inside of the pavement where the gap is for pedestrians to cross.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement is breaking up - the hole is getting bigger, 12th May
item.description:
Outside 4 larkhay road, there is a pot hole that needs fixing. You came and fixed one, but missed this one as on the day you came out it was bin day and our bins were covering it. it would be great if you can take the loose stones away and fill this one please..

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Larkhay Road, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Road Verge Heavily Damaged by Heavy Trucks and Flooding, 12th May
item.description:
West side of the Ham Hill road; about 250 yards from the bottom of the hill; opposite the property called "The Stables".

item.title: Continuous water emerging from road, Severn Trent have stated not a leak. Another new pothole formed around the wet area, 12th May
item.description:
Outside 12 Lynmouth Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lynmouth Road, Hucclecote, Gloucester

item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Cycle path is overgrown, 12th May
item.description:
The cycle path from the bottom of the park to golden valley underpasse is overgrown . You can only just pass through in single file and have to duck under low hanging branches .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged Access Panel - possibly Severn Trent main sewer., 11th May
item.description:
Just up the road, in the centre of the road, from number 31. I first logged this on 10/8/23 - DMC001049 and since via the new FixMyStreet service - 5235798. I was surprised to receive an e-mail today saying that 'this enquiry has been addressed' - because it certainly hasn't. It's been faulty for 9 months, and is looking more and more damaged.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westmead Road, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sunken manhole cover, 11th May
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 155, Arle Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Multiple potholes in the road, 11th May
item.description:

item.title: Reindeer carcass, 11th May
item.description:

item.title: Manhole cover, 10th May
item.description:

item.title: Blocking visibility on road/junction (Grass/verge) problem, 10th May
item.description:
